title: Sleepwalking
description: Sleepwalking is a snowy adventure across 3 MBF21 maps that exists because I made a few midis and wanted to make maps to accompany them. Wad was tested with dsda-doom 0.28.1 (-complevel 21) and GZDoom 4.8.2 (default compatibility). However, wad uses a few tricks that don't work as expected in gzdoom (secret transfers and some visual tricks), so playing in dsda is preferable. Map & music list: Map 01 - It's noisy outside Midi - "Cat vs February" Map 02 - Here come the whales Midi - "Pinocchio D...
